tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE electric_vehicle_battery (
    vehicle_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    battery_capacity INT,
    battery_health DECIMAL,
    charge_level DECIMAL,
    last_maintenance_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE vehicle_info (
	vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	manufacturer VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	model VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	year INT NOT NULL,
	battery_capacity DECIMAL NOT NULL,
	battery_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE VehicleDetails (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    make VARCHAR(50),
    model VARCHAR(50),
    year INT,
    max_speed INT
);

CREATE TABLE charging_history (
    charge_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT REFERENCES vehicle_details(vehicle_id),
    charging_date TIMESTAMP,
    charging_duration INTERVAL,
    charging_energy FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE vehicle_info (
    vehicle_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_name VARCHAR(255),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
    battery_capacity DECIMAL,
    warranty_start_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE battery_health (
    battery_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id UUID,
    health_status VARCHAR(50),
    last_checkup_date DATE,
    charge_cycles INT
)

CREATE TABLE charging_history (
    charging_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id UUID,
    charging_start_time TIMESTAMP,
    charging_end_time TIMESTAMP,
    charging_duration INTERVAL,
    charge_energy DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE battery_error_log (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    battery_id UUID,
    error_message TEXT,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
    schedule_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id UUID,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(100),
    planned_date DATE,
    completed BOOLEAN
)
